scenes.action_text: A QUIET PLACE Screenplay by Bryan Woods, Scott Beck & John Krasinski Story by Bryan Woods & Scott Beck BLACK We hear, very clearly, the sound of light wind. 1 EXT. TOWN - MAIN ST. - LATE AFTERNOON 1 We come up on... a streetlight. There is no illumination... and no movement. We hold on it for a long moment when suddenly... The streetlight bobs... and then begins to sway. We slowly begin to rise up on the streetlight t
